content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and pipe group with multiple pipes including position x=-0.5, y=-2.5.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power and research automation.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted.
- Ensure the entity has available space for the item being inserted.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to power network
- Ensure the entity is connected to a power network before using it.

### Errors when using entities with no input liquid
- Ensure the entity has an input liquid before using it.

### Errors when using entities with no fluid present in connections
- Ensure the entity has fluid present in its connections before using it.

### Errors when finding pipe groups
- Ensure a pipe group exists before attempting to find it.

### Errors when finding electricity groups
- Ensure an electricity group exists before attempting to find it.
